com.github.mob41.kmbeta.api

Class ServerTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mob41.kmbeta.api.ServerTime

  • public class ServerTime
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for separating server time fetched from KMB ETA Server. This class is probably useless for API users.
    Author:
    Anthony

      • getRawServerTime

        public java.lang.String getRawServerTime()
        Get the raw fetched server time (e.g. 2016-04-18 19:29:06)
        Returns:
        String

      • getServerTime

        public static java.lang.String getServerTime()
        Get KMB data feed server time. And save to memory for other functions

        Must be called before any arrival calculating events.
        e.g. 23:45:33
        Returns:
        String
